page.title: 07A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY 2
page.content: MY TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY IS GET UP AT 7AM,I GO HAVE A WASH AND GET DRESSED. I MAKE MY BED THEN I GO AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST WHICH IS USUALLY TOAST AND BRAN FLAKES. AT 8AM I LEAVE MY HOUSE TO CALL FOR MY FRIEND LAUREN WHO LIVES DOWN THE ROAD. WE GET TO THE BUS STOP ABOUT 8.08, WE THEN WAIT TILL 8.15 WHEN THE MINIBUS COMES. WHEN I GET ON THE BUS ON MONDAY I PAY DAVE, THE DRIVER, Â£1.50 FOR THE WHOLE WEEK.WE GET TO SCHOOL ABOUT 8.25, SOMTIMES HE DROPS US OFF AT THE WAVY LINE SHOP ON THE WAY BACK. AT 9.15 WE HAVE MORNING REGISTRATION, AT 10.50 WE HAVE MORNING BREAK THEN AT 12.15 WE HAVE LUNCH IN THE DINING HALL. AT 1.25PM WE HAVE AFTERNOON REGISTRATION THEN AT 2.40 BREAK. AT 4PM LUCKILY IT'S HOMETIME -HOORAY, FREE AT LAST, YIPEE!!
